short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your ChatGPT experience with additional features and customization options.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing ChatGPT Enhancer, the ultimate extension to boost your ChatGPT experience! This handy tool adds a plethora of features and customization options to make your conversations with ChatGPT even more engaging and efficient.

Key features of ChatGPT Enhancer include:

Custom prompts: Create, save, and manage your custom prompts with ease.
Quick selection: Access your saved prompts from a convenient dropdown menu and insert them into the chat with just one click.
Seamless integration: ChatGPT Enhancer works in harmony with the ChatGPT interface, providing a smooth and intuitive user experience.
User-friendly settings: Manage your saved prompts and preferences effortlessly through an easy-to-use settings page.
Whether you are a casual user or a power user, ChatGPT Enhancer is designed to provide you with a superior ChatGPT experience. Enhance your conversations, streamline your workflow, and get more out of ChatGPT today with ChatGPT Enhancer!
